data.speaker: You
data.text: Hi this is Alex with Brightlane. How are you today?

data.speaker: Prospect
data.text: I have a minute, go ahead.

data.speaker: You
data.text: The reason I’m calling is we help companies in SaaS startups using a analytics platform to reduce slow release cycles.

data.speaker: Prospect
data.text: What does that look like for a team like ours?

data.speaker: You
data.text: Would you be open to book a 15-minute demo?

data.speaker: You
data.text: Hi this is Taylor with Northstar. How are you today?

data.speaker: You
data.text: The reason I’m calling is we help companies in fintech firms using a security solution to reduce manual reconciliation.

data.speaker: Prospect
data.text: We don't have budget / not a priority right now.

data.speaker: You
data.text: I understand — many of our customers felt the same until they tried Northstar. What if I showed you a short example?

data.speaker: Prospect
data.text: That sounds interesting — can you share more?

data.speaker: You
data.text: Would you be open to schedule a follow-up call?
